content: CITI Rewards Card UOB Preferred Platinum Visa Card Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 Oct 2018Which credit card do you think is better: UOB Platinum Preferred or Citi Rewards?UOB Platinum Preferred or Citi Rewards?1 answerAnswerBump0

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 08 Oct 2018Personally, I'll stick with Citi.. UOB's rewards structure is in blocks of S$5 spent. Whereas citi's as I recall is for every dollar. You'll also vomit blood getting fee waivers from UOB. 0 comments0
